src_original: atikrāmati yo mūḍhaḥ siddhis tasya na cottamā ||
tato guruḥ karṇe kathayet caturānandavibhāga || ( 11 )  tato bahir nirgacched guruḥ || prajñā tu
nagnībhūyotkuṭakena guhya tarjanyā darśayati ||  ki tvam utsahase vatsa madīyāśucibhakṣaṇa |  viṇmūtrañ caiva raktañ ca bhagasyāntaḥ pracūṣaṇa ||
kiñ cāha notsahe mātas tvadīyāśucibhakṣana |  kāryā bhaktir mayā strīṇā yāvad ābodhimaṇḍataḥ ||
